Honeywell’s solutions have supported many critical industries that underpin the global economy throughout the pandemic. From aerospace to building technologies to manufacturing process controls to worker safety, as well as vaccinations distribution. The Honeywell UV Treatment System makes flying safer and helps passengers feel more confident flying again. It can treat an aircraft cabin effectively with clinical-proven UVC light in less than 10 minutes between flights.
Recently, a smaller version innovative backpack design with a UV treatment wand <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/cabin/uv-treatment-wand?utm_source=website&utm_medium=public_relations&utm_campaign=21_bti_hygiene]]> was released to the market to serve beyond airplanes, such as buses and trains.
